tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id      SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id        INT,
    game_id          INT,
    rating           FLOAT,
    comment          TEXT,
    created_at       TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE GameReviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    review TEXT,
    rating INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE GameReviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id INT,
    player_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT,
    date_posted DATETIME
);

CREATE TABLE review (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    review_date TIMESTAMP,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE virtual_reality_game (
    game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_name TEXT,
    genre TEXT,
    release_date DATE,
    developer TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE game_feedback (
    game_id INT,
    player_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP,
    helpful_votes INT
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    rating INT,
    review_text VARCHAR(255),
    review_date DATE
);
